page.title: 04Employment in Hunshelf.
page.content: The majority of the inhabitants of this area work in farming or are employed by the B.S.C.,working in the Stocksbridge steelworks.Many,if not most,therefore work outside the area. Other jobs include working as milkmen or for the South Yorkshire Water Board. Unemployment is low. Those unemployed include housewives and mothers,as well as retired farmers. Many people must commute to Sheffield or Barnsley to work.Some of the inhabitants work as solicitors, accountants,bankclerks,antique dealers,etc-a great range of jobs,in fact.
